amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete section 201 which provided for a repeal of slot restrictions at O'Hare, LaGuardia, and Kennedy airports and allow for slot increases at Reagan National airport.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 7 and printed in H. Rept. 106-185 to strike section 201 that repeals the slot restrictions at O'Hare, LaGuardia, and Kennedy airports and allows for slot increases at Reagan National airport.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hyde amendment (A007) Failed by voice vote.
